hanadb_total_used_memory.query: SELECT ROUND(SUM(TOTAL_MEMORY_USED_SIZE/1024/1024), 2) AS 'Used Memory MB' FROM M_SERVICE_MEMORY;

hanadb_column_tables_used_memory.query: SELECT ROUND(SUM(MEMORY_SIZE_IN_TOTAL)/1024/1024) AS 'Column Tables MB Used' FROM M_CS_TABLES;
hanadb_column_tables_used_memory.description: Column tables total memory used in MB

hanadb_schema_used_memory.query: SELECT SCHEMA_NAME AS 'Schema', ROUND(SUM(MEMORY_SIZE_IN_TOTAL)/1024/1024) AS 'MB Used' FROM M_CS_TABLES GROUP BY SCHEMA_NAME ORDER BY 'MB Used' DESC;
hanadb_schema_used_memory.description: Total used memory by schema in MB
